Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2011 08:15PM Rayapple wrote: Thanks for the reply Sheila! I've been so stressed out since her mammogram......... Now I can relax a bit. Her US is tomorrow so I guess I'll know more then....... The waiting sucks!
Posts.Title: Worried about my mom Rayapple Rayapple

Posts.Content: Rayapple wrote: Hi Everyone! My mom went for her Mammogram yesterday. A few hours after her test her Doctors office called to tell her she needed an ultrasound of her right breast. We leave on vacation on Saturday and the nurse pushed her to have the US before we left. So my question to you is should I be more concerned at the urgency of this US and the quickness of the call back? This was her first Digital Mammogram and she has had fat deposits on the breast in the past...... I am sooooo sorry that I am rambling....... Just upset and scared for my mom, Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Worried about my mom Rayapple Rayapple
